summary: The legendary, powerful blade that's emanating with fiery power. Many adventurers have ventured to the ruins to only but combust into flames. Are you strong enough?
descriptionHtml:
STEAM VERSION: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=241013583]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=241013583[/url]


[b]-Azure Aura Weapon Details-[/b]
[b]Location:[/b] Look at the gallery for location. It appears on the map but isn't unlocked at download so therefore it must be discovered.
[b]Stats:[/b] Base damage is 20. Drain 30 magika on hit. 20 fire damage over 2 seconds.
[b]Handedness:[/b] One-handed.
[b]Level requirement?:[/b] Yes, 30.
[b]Requires DLC?:[/b] No.
Is there a quest with it?: No.

Note: OP if you're a low level.

Is a retexture of the Nordic sword.



[b]-Dyeing-[/b]
With the latest update, the Azure Aura can be dyed into 5 new colors: red, purple, green, orange and yellow. With the proper ingredience it can be recolored. Visit a forge to dye the sword to your heart's content. WARNING: the dyeing/undyeing process will reset any tempering that's been done to the sword!



[b]-FAQs-[/b]
[i]Can I have another for dual-wield?[/i] In the console, type 'help azure 4' If you see a code with several numbers and a letter or two, remember that number then type in 'player.additem X 1'
X is the number you had to remember and 1 is the amount of the item you want.

[i]Can it be tempered (improved)?[/i] Yes.



[b]-To Be Added-[/b]
*A full arsenal of different weapon types with the same texture and enchantment. (Yes, this did win the poll, but this takes much more development time than the recolored swords)



[b][i]Thanks to Gamespot for the mod review![/i][/b]

If you find any bugs or anything that looks out of place, please leave a comment. Thank you.
Enjoy!
author: Kyle8497

files.name: Custom Sword - The Azure Aura (NO RECOLORS)
Custom Sword - The Azure Aura
files.changelogHtml:
-The Azure Aura can now be dyed, at a forge, into 5 other colors: red, purple, green, orange and yellow.
-The colored versions can be tempered.
-The original Azure Aura can be reobtained from its dyed counterparts at a forge.
